reviewtext: works great for my needs, but I'm not a fan of the coiled wire and angled plug. thankfully the coil is a softer compound so it doesn't pull on my head during use, but I would have preferred a straight wire. I know I know-- "it was in the details". Well, I admit I apparently didn't read them all.the angled plug is more an issue, since a straight plug fits my needs better.I shopped Koss based on another Koss headset I bought. I'd buy Koss again (obviously).
summary: great but for the coiled wire and angled plug
